description: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = number of distinct prime factors of C(n,k).
links: T. D. Noe, Rows n=0..100 of triangle, flattened
Pierre Goetgheluck, On prime divisors of binomial coefficients, Math. Comp. 51 (1988), no. 183, 325-329.
mathematica: Flatten[Table[b=Binomial[n,k]; If[b==1, 0, Length[FactorInteger[b]]], {n,0,12}, {k,0,n}]] (* _T. D. Noe_, Oct 19 2007, Apr 03 2012 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_; edited Oct 06 2007 at the suggestion of T. D. Noe.
